FuncDef: The display network-header-length configuration command displays network header lengths configured for interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays detailed information about network header lengths configured for interfaces.
-

Specifies the slot ID of a board.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 16.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After a network header length is configured for an interface using the port shaping shaping-value network-header-length network-header-length command, you can run the display network-header-length configuration command to check the configured value.
